job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pA successful deep learning chip startup has developed an advanced voice AI processor that can be implemented into a variety of edge devices ppbrppThey are looking for a strong speech and audio engineer with experience with classical methods and advanced neural networks to contribute to the further development of speech and audio processing algorithms ppbrppYoull work on a variety of projects including multimicrophone spatial processing acoustics echo cancellation singlechannel noise suppression ppbrppAs SME youll advise current and future customers on integration into their listening and audio devices Youll be working on IP that will translate to patents and publications in the field as you work crossfunctionally to develop stateoftheart algorithmsppbrppTo be considered youll needpulliPhD in a relevant technical fieldlili5 years as a strong technical contributor in speech andor audio processingliliA strong list of patents and publicationsliliIn depth technical knowledge ready to take on a SME roleliliExperience with machine learning deep learning audio processing speech processing speech recognition multimicrophone spatial processing acoustics echo cancellation singlechannel noise suppression acoustic testing source separation singlechannel noise suppression dereverberationliul
